name: lol-impostor
description: Impostor game with League of Legends champions

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd lol-impostor-backend && npm install && cd ../lol-impostor-frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:check: npm run build && echo 'âœ… Build successful! Ready for deployment'
scripts.prod:test: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.clean: cd lol-impostor-backend && npm run clean && cd ../lol-impostor-frontend && rm -rf dist
